content.raw:
There seems to be a problem with the current Xenial build: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition\_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/1/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/1/console)

A port from this, with the DSL code present here we are going to generate a good bunch of jobs. I'm not sure if we are ready for having:

* Windows and Homebrew jobs
* Install jobs for packages in the different Ubuntu flavours

I prefer not to have failing jobs in Jenkins so it would be nice to disable all the options that we can not have working before merging the PR.  We should probably have done the same for ign\_gui, feel free to do it in this PR for those of the ign\_gui jobs currently failing.
content.html:
There seems to be a problem with the current Xenial build: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/1/console

A port from this, with the DSL code present here we are going to generate a good bunch of jobs. I'm not sure if we are ready for having:

  • Windows and Homebrew jobs
  • Install jobs for packages in the different Ubuntu flavours

I prefer not to have failing jobs in Jenkins so it would be nice to disable all the options that we can not have working before merging the PR. We should probably have done the same for ign_gui, feel free to do it in this PR for those of the ign_gui jobs currently failing.
